nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_707
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I am sure that I will make something of myself, even though I have not achieved any major success so far.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_708
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I have been working hard for so many years; I feel I am entitled to a good future.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_709
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When her husband deserted her, leaving her with nothing but scattered pieces of life to pick up, she went insane.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_710
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: From my standpoint, Mother was too hard on me then, without taking my feelings into account.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_711
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When I reached the summit of my professional career, mother's words "Never be a quitter in face of life" were constantly in my mind.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_712
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: You should know better than to play football in the street.
